text: Sam Boghosian (December 22, 1931 â€“ February 26, 2020) was an American college and professional football coach. He played college ball as a guard for the UCLA Bruins, and was later an assistant coach at his alma mater. He was added into the UCLA Athletic Hall of Fame. Boghosian died on February 26, 2020 at his home in Indian Wells, California at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American football players Category:American football coaches Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles
title: Sam Boghosian
